    • Constructor Detail

      • TextContainer

        public TextContainer(java.lang.String filePath,
                     boolean isFilepath)
        TextContainer-Object contains different representations of a text.
        Parameters:
        filePath - - the filepath/the string
        isFilePath - = true - then the String is seen as relative filepath.
        isFilePath - = false - then the String is seen as the text.

      • getDislegomenon

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getDislegomenon()

        all lower case : yes
        contains punctuation : no

      • getTaggedSentences
